Address.value: 750 WEST PENDER STREET,SUITE 250 SUITE 250, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6C 2T7, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Foremost Lithium (NASDAQ FMST, CSE FAT) is a hard-rock exploration company strategically located to capitalize on the world growing EV appetite and is committed to being a premier supplier of North Americas lithium feedstock. As the world transitions towards decarbonization, the company is focused on exploration and growth on its 4 core Lithium Lane Projects with over 43,000 acres in Snow Lake Manitoba and also advancing its Lac Simard South Property in Quebec.
